definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 該集團還推出了太陽鏡和化妝品等新的副產品。

sentences.english: For people praying for you is a byproduct of yourgenerosity.
sentences.chinese: 因爲人們爲你禱告是你慷慨大方的一個副產品。

sentences.english: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.chinese: 二噁英是一些工業過程和廢物焚化的有害副產品。

sentences.english: Leather and Allied Product Manufacturing Subsector in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 美國皮革及其副產品製造行業報告。

sentences.english: Heteroalcohol oil , as an industrial sub-product, has very important developing Value .
sentences.chinese: 雜醇油是具有開發價值的工業副產品。

sentences.english: The by-product gas of producing of traditional coking technique belongs to the gas of easy burning.
sentences.chinese: 傳統焦化工藝產生的副產品煤氣屬易燃氣體。

sentences.english: This is the new and annotated China Agricultural Sideline Product Market in the 21th century.
sentences.chinese: 這就是21世紀全新詮釋的中國農副產品交易市場。

sentences.english: E. g. Tofu skin is Tofu's by-product.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐皮是豆腐的副產品。

sentences.english: When this is done, chlorinated byproducts such as furans and dioxins are produced.
sentences.chinese: 當做到這一點，氯化副產品，如二噁英和呋喃的生產。

sentences.english: 'It is definitely a good by-product,' Mr. Bharadwaj says.
sentences.chinese: Bharadwaj說，這絕對是個良好的副產品。

sentences.english: But what about the wastes and by-products they generate?
sentences.chinese: 但這些活動產生的廢物和副產品怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Another downside would be the disappearance of animal by-products.
sentences.chinese: 另一個趨勢是動物副產品的下降。

sentences.english: Produce the earthnut of edible oil and soya bean, belong to farming the category of by-product.
sentences.chinese: 生產食用油的花生和黃豆，屬於農副產品的範疇。

sentences.english: The factory produces machines for processing farm and sideline products.
sentences.chinese: 這家工廠生產加工農副產品的機器。

sentences.english: Bismuth is the by-product of lead and copper refining, as well as other metals to a smaller degree.
sentences.chinese: 鉍是鉛和銅精煉後的副產品。

sentences.english: These bacteria emit hydrogen sulfide gas as a by-product.
sentences.chinese: 這些細菌排放的硫化氫氣體是其分解過程的副產品。
